question: The Documentation and Dissemination Division of the Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances (DARPG) primarily carries out the activities of?
explanation: The Documentation and Dissemination Division of the Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances (DARPG) primarily carries out the activities of documentation, incubation and dissemination of good governance practices of Centre, State/Union Territory Governments with a view to sharing of experience with each other and replication elsewhere.
